nameOverride.description: Override name of the chart used in Kubernetes object names.

clientSecret.description: AppDynamics oauth2 client secret plain text.

clientSecretEnvVar.description: AppDynamics oauth2 client secret environment variable.

spec.description: The spec section of OpenTelemetry Operator. Refer to https://github.com/open-telemetry/opentelemetry-operator/blob/main/docs/api.md#opentelemetrycollectorspec for possible properties

config.description: OpenTelemetry Collector Configuration. It is the recommended way to set the collector config. If spec.config is set, this property won't take effect. Refer to the OpenTelemetry Collector documentation for details..

configOverride.description: Any additional OpenTelemetry Collector Configuration for the enabled configuration. We can also use this field to remove/add new components to the pipelines

serviceAccount.description: ServiceAccount applied by this chart, disable it by setting create to false.

service.description: service expose collector for external traffics.

rbac.description: RBAC rules associated with the service account. If created, a Role will be created and bind with the collector service account
